properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable the jEAP Sequential Inbox.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.config-location
properties.description: The location of the configuration file for the jEAP Sequential Inbox.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.housekeeping.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable housekeeping tasks for the jEAP Sequential Inbox.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.housekeeping.expiry-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduling the housekeeping task that marks expired messages for removal.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.housekeeping.closed-instances-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduling the housekeeping task that deletes closed sequence instances.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.housekeeping.delete-for-removal-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduling the housekeeping task that deletes for-removal sequence instances.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.idle-lock-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Terminate any sequential inbox lock transaction that held a sequence instance lock for more than this number of seconds. Defaults to 600 seconds (10 minutes). This value only comes into play if a lock is either held for too long because of an error in the message processing logic, or if a DB connection is not detected to be terminated by the DB server and the lock thus not released. Used to set the postgres parameter idle_in_transaction_session_timeout using 'SET LOCAL idle_in_transaction_session_timeout' for the current transaction. Set to -1 to disable this feature, the system default of the database server will be used in this case.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.metrics.update-rate-minutes
properties.description: The rate in minutes at which the metrics requiring database queries (e.g. waiting message counts) are updated.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.sequencing-start-timestamp
properties.description: Timestamp from which the sequencing should effectively start. Once this parameter is configured, the recording mode will be activated.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.pending-actions.messages-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduling the pending action task that process messages with pending actions.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.pending-actions.sequences-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for scheduling the pending action task that process sequence instances with pending actions.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.pending-actions.lock-at-least
properties.description: Minimal time in seconds to keep a lock at this job.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.pending-actions.lock-at-most
properties.description: Maximal time in minutes to keep a lock at this job.

properties.name: jeap.messaging.sequential-inbox.pending-actions.max-pages
properties.description: Max. pages to process in one run. This limits the amount of time one run can max. spend.
